activities.description: The construction of stable deep pools that will retain an open-water portion throughout the winter months, allowing fish occupation year-round.
The restoration of approximately 1,113 m² of an unstable and eroding bank section located immediately downstream of the bridge structure on the east river bank.
Sediment and erosion control measures must be in place and shall be upgraded and maintained, such that release of sediment is avoided at the location of the authorized work, undertaking, or activity.
The replacement of two corrugated steel pipe (CSP) drainage outlets with a 1 m bottom ditch lined with rip-rap
The modification of a third CSP drainage outlet to outlet into a controlled pool with a rock pad
The re-grading of the bank section to accommodate the new drainage outlets and reduce erosion
